Display.Size: 4.5 inches, 110 x 35 mm, 37.2 cm2 (~42.0% screen-to-body ratio)

Platform.OS: Open Symbian, based on Symbian v6.0, Series 80 UI

Memory.\u00a0:
14 MB application memory
2 MB + card capacity user memory
Processor: 32-bit ARM9-based RISC CPU at 52 MHz

Sound.\u00a0:
Audio Speaker
Ringtone formats: RNG, WAV, AU, WVE

Features.\u00a0:
Attachment viewers
Video player
Document viewer (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, PDF)
All PDA functions
Imaging (Digital camera connectivity)
